title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 463.3 - Educational services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 463.3 - Educational services

State Regulations

Upon oral or written request, educational services shall
be given promptly, within 30 days of request, individually or in groups, to
eligible persons by services staff members or other qualified individuals
employed or otherwise available for this purpose. They may be provided directly
or by referral to a licensed family-planning center or clinic. (a) Educational services means educational
information about and discussion of the family-planning services program. Such
services do not include medically related counseling. (b) Educational services may be purchased by
a social services district from a licensed family-planning center or
clinic. (c) Educational services
shall be supplemented by the distribution and display of leaflets, pamphlets, notices, form letters, poster-type announcements, placards or other effective
means of disseminating information generally about family-planning services to
eligible persons. These must comply with the requirements of the
program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
463.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
